name: Guns Girls Lawyers Spies
description:
GGLS - Spy Tycoon is a intelligence trade strategy game. Build your own private intelligence agency and become a Spy Tycoon. Establish spy stations, cells and bases. Hire an agents and a secretaries. Find a lawyer. Get into jet. Travel around the world. Trade with weapons, WMD, state secrets, technologies. Build your private intelligence empire. Become a Top Spy Tycoon.

Features:

Hire, Buy, Bribe

  • Hire and select your girls, agents and lawyers.
  • Buy spies, secretaries, escorts, bodyguards, and mercenaries.
  • Bribe lawyers, politicians and criminals. Use 'honey traps'.

Travel, Establish, Control

  • Travel around the world, establish and run spy stations and bases worldwide.
  • Improve the base and pack it with agents and special forces.
  • Establish intelligence connections in countries and regions.
  • Use cargo aircraft for trade and protect them with combat aircraft

Units

  • More than 100 unit types
  • Use special units, fighters, attackers, bombers, helicopters, cargo aircraft, artillery and armored vehicles ( detail list below)

Buy, Sell, Steal, Trade

  • Trade with arms, information, technology and weapons of mass Destruction, including space programs, chemical, nuclear and biological weapons.
  • Be careful with Sarin, Anthrax, Ebola, Plague and Typhus

Combat

  • Attack hostile governments, terrorists, enemy spies and lawyers.
  • Defend your spy stations and bases.
  • Five combat types: Spy War, Urban Fight, Air Fight, Legal/Political Battle, Army Combat

Missions and Scenarios

Mission Types:

  • Find and Destroy (find him and kill him)
  • Dirty Money
  • Find and Rescue (save your agents, prisoners and hostages)
  • Make Profit (earn as much money as you can)
